channel.title: [PI] Special attack still showing after special attack weapon is unequipped
channel.description:
I'm having this issue whenever I wield an item that has a special attack. When I remove the item, the special attack bar still stays.
Unarmed before equip.
[img]http://puu.sh/9IZXJ/aeeabc178f.jpg[/img]
Equipping an item that has a special attack.
[img]http://puu.sh/9J01g/88d93d0207.png[/img]
Removing the item, but still having the special attack bar.
[img]http://puu.sh/9J07z/0fb1a15542.png[/img]
